channel.title: [Pi] EclipsePk [Pi]
channel.description:
[size=18pt][b]EclipsePk[/b][/size] [b]EclipsePk is only been out and worked on for about 2 months already. Im gathering up some good coder's so we can keep the server up-to-date, and running smoothly. Im not the best coder out in Moparscape Community. I've coded for about 8-9 months already. The server is mainly going to be active in Pk'ing. New mini-games are already added like [/b]" [i]Land of elves[/i]".[b] Im trying to perfect all skill's so the skiller's can suply and demand. Players: Demand. Skillers: Suply, that way the Eco just keeps running.[/b]
Application Format: Name: Coding experience (show some work) : Age: How long you spen on the computer daily (hours) :
[center][b]Adding to Server/Client: 1. Custom Npcs 2. Donor Interface 3. Minigame Interface 4. Donor Zone + rank 5. Godsword 2H 100% 6. Castle Wars 7. Exp Lock Options 8. Duel Arena 9. Fixed Dupes 10. Barrows 11. Working Barrages 12. Skill Interfaces 13. Quests 14. Bandos Gwd 15. 100% Working Clan Chat 16. Pest Control w/ Spinners 17. Bounty Hunter[/b][/center] [b] Im sorry but not pictures ATM. still gathering information to put on this Topic! Please support me (us) in the project, and well keep you informed! [/b]

item.title: [Pi] EclipsePk [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

Name: Anthony
Coding experience (show some work) : ive been coding for about 1 year, i can code delta and project insanity, im great, and at your request, can code some snippets for proof.
Age: 13
How long you spend on the computer daily (hours) : 3-5 (can be on longer if needed)

reach me: you can reach me at antman97@ymail.com either email me, or add that to your msn.

item.title: [Pi] EclipsePk [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @beast_k0 beast k0
item.description:
@beast_k0 wrote:

[size=18pt]EclipsePk[/size]

EclipsePk is only been out and worked on for about 2 months already. Im gathering up some good coder’s so we can keep the server up-to-date, and running smoothly. Im not the best coder out in Moparscape Community. I’ve coded for about 8-9 months already. The server is mainly going to be active in Pk’ing. New mini-games are already added like " Land of elves". Im trying to perfect all skill’s so the skiller’s can suply and demand. Players: Demand. Skillers: Suply, that way the Eco just keeps running.

Application Format: Name: Coding experience (show some work) : Age: How long you spen on the computer daily (hours) :

[center][b]Adding to Server/Client:

  1. Custom Npcs
  2. Donor Interface
  3. Minigame Interface
  4. Donor Zone + rank
  5. Godsword 2H 100%
  6. Castle Wars
  7. Exp Lock Options
  8. Duel Arena
  9. Fixed Dupes
  10. Barrows
  11. Working Barrages
  12. Skill Interfaces
  13. Quests
  14. Bandos Gwd
  15. 100% Working Clan Chat
  16. Pest Control w/ Spinners
  17. Bounty Hunter[/b][/center]

    Im sorry but not pictures ATM. still gathering information to put on this Topic! Please support me (us) in the project, and well keep you informed!

Read full topic
